# delegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate object for the highlight center.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any SWHighlightCenterDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Setting the delegate

- **SWHighlightCenterDelegate**: The protocol you use to notify the delegate when the list or rank order of surfaced highlights changes.
